title: Zoe has no counter in lane
body: she can poke all champs from under her turret  so there is no champ that counter her  she is OP

replies.body: she poop on all melee champs lol

>she can poke all champs from under her turret

Not if there are minions in front of or behind her. And even then, you'd see her lining up the skillshot. You don't stand still for lined skillshots half a screen away, right?
with her ult can poke u from a long range and her aoe q will hit u sometimes if u are a melee that want to farm
She has her counters but that doesn't mean she is not overpowered. Definitely not fun getting your hp halved by gunblade/ignite/protobelt level 3-4.

While I agree on her being too strong I disagree on her having no counter in lane.
Play GP, screw her E.
she can hit you from the right or left side with her ult so u are not safe with a good zoe player
